MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.45pm to carry out repairs to an underground cable fault at the corner of Auldhill Avenue and Auldhill Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.27pm on Thursday 21st January 2021.
